expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: Inconsistent indentation detected (mixed 2-space and 4-space levels).
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Use a consistent indentation style.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Use | or > for multi-line scalar values.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Use one style consistently in the same block.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: Unknown key "reslt" in end condition.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Did you mean "result"?

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: metadata id must be a non-empty string.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Set id to a non-empty identifier string.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: metadata.players.min must be <= metadata.players.max.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Adjust player bounds so min is not greater than max.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: metadata.players.min must be >= 1.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Set players.min to 1 or greater.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: Unknown key "actions" in turnStructure.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Use one of the supported turnStructure keys: phases.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: turnStructure.phases must be a non-empty array.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Define at least one phase in turnStructure.phases.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: zone field "ordering" must be one of: stack, queue, set.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Set ordering to one of: stack, queue, set.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: zone field "owner" must be one of: none, player.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Set owner to one of: none, player.

expectedCombinedDiagnostics.message: zone field "visibility" must be one of: public, owner, hidden.
expectedCombinedDiagnostics.suggestion: Set visibility to one of: public, owner, hidden.
